statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE trade_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT trade_price, trade_volume FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE cryptocurrency_symbol = 'BTC' ORDER BY trade_price DESC;
SELECT user_id, trade_date, trade_time FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE trade_volume > 1000 ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT COUNT(*), cryptocurrency_symbol FROM cryptocurrency_trading GROUP BY cryptocurrency_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, trade_date, trade_time, trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY trade_price DESC, trade_date ASC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_symbol, SUM(trade_volume) AS total_volume FROM cryptocurrency_trading GROUP BY cryptocurrency_symbol HAVING total_volume > 1000 ORDER BY total_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE trade_volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND trade_price < 50 ORDER BY trade_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_trades FROM cryptocurrency_trading WHERE trade_price > 200 GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_trades DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities
SELECT authority_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_authorities
SELECT trade_id, cryptocurrency_symbol, trade_volume, trade_timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_trades
SELECT authority_id, authority_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_volume > 1000
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT authority_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC;

SELECT authority_name, COUNT(*) AS trade_count FROM regulatory_authorities JOIN cryptocurrency_trades ON regulatory_authorities.authority_id = cryptocurrency_trades.authority_id GROUP BY authority_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT authority_name, trade_volume FROM regulatory_authorities JOIN cryptocurrency_trades ON regulatory_authorities.authority_id = cryptocurrency_trades.authority_id WHERE trade_volume > 1000 ORDER BY trade_volume DESC;

SELECT authority_name, trade_timestamp FROM regulatory_authorities JOIN cryptocurrency_trades ON regulatory_authorities.authority_id = cryptocurrency_trades.authority_id WHERE trade_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities;
SELECT authority_name FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT pattern_type, pattern_description FROM trading_patterns WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT volume_amount, asset_type FROM trading_volumes WHERE volume_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_name LIKE '%Authority%';
SELECT authority_name, region FROM regulatory_authorities;
SELECT pattern_description, pattern_type FROM trading_patterns ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_volumes WHERE volume_amount > 10000;
SELECT volume_amount, asset_type FROM trading_volumes WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' AND transaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT authority_name, region, pattern_type FROM regulatory_authorities JOIN trading_patterns ON regulatory_authorities.authority_id = trading_patterns.pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities;
SELECT authority_name, authority_id FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY authority_id DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trader_location FROM trader_info WHERE trader_location = 'USA';
SELECT trade_id, trade_volume, trade_date FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_volume > 1000;
SELECT analysis_id, trade_id, authority_id FROM trade_analysis WHERE authority_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities;
SELECT authority_name, authority_id FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC;
SELECT trade_id, crypto_symbol, trade_volume FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_volume > 1000;
SELECT analysis_id, trade_id, authority_id FROM trade_analysis WHERE trade_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM trader_info WHERE trader_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities;
SELECT authority_name, location FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE authority_id = 1;
SELECT trader_name, trades_executed FROM traders ORDER BY trades_executed DESC;
SELECT platform_name, country FROM trading_platforms WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT trade_id, analysis_result FROM trading_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_authorities WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT authority_name, location FROM regulatory_authorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trades_executed FROM traders WHERE trades_executed > 100 ORDER BY trades_executed DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_volume, trade_price FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_price > 500 ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT platform_name, country FROM trading_platforms WHERE country = 'UK' ORDER BY platform_name ASC;
